ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Your Lord's Assault is very fierce indeed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The grip of your Lord is severe indeed!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Stern indeed is your Lord's punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The vengeance of God is terribly severe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed the seizure of your Lord is very severe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, the punishment of your Lord is severe and painful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely the might of your Lord is great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely thy Lord's assault is terrible.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! the punishment of thy Lord is stern.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The grip of your Lord is indeed severe,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily the grip of thine Lord is severe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed your Lord’s striking is severe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Truly strong is the Grip (and Power) of thy Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, (O Muhammad (Peace be upon him)) the Grip (Punishment) of your Lord is severe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, the seizing of your Lord is severe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The onslaught of your Lord is severe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, the vengeance of your Lord is severe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [85:12] Assuredly your Lord’s assault, against the disbelievers, is severe, [as severe] as He will [it to be].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! the punishment of thy Lord) the seizure of your Lord of those who disbelieve in Him (is stern.
